thread.title: Seahawks WR Paul Richardson Makes Absurd One-Handed TD Catch While Being Interfered
thread.title_full: Seahawks WR Paul Richardson Makes Absurd One-Handed TD Catch While Being Interfered

author: Jorge Alonso
title: Seahawks WR Paul Richardson Makes Absurd One-Handed TD Catch While Being Interfered
text:
It’s the first week of the NFL playoffs and Seahawks wide receiver Paul Richardson make already have the catch of the postseason. 
Watch as Richardson scores an amazing one-handed touchdown on fourth down while getting interfered being interfered. 
Absurd.
